articles.author: ABC News
articles.title: Ashes fate could be known this week, with English cricket board meeting to decide if tour can go ahead under current conditions
articles.description: The England and Wales Cricket Board will meet this week "to decide whether the conditions in place are sufficient for the Tour to go ahead", as players continue to express doubts over isolation requirements.
articles.content: Just over two months out from the scheduled start of the first men's Ashes Test, English cricket bosses will this week meet to decide whether they are comfortable sending players to Australia if it m… [+5187 chars]

articles.author: BBC Sport
articles.title: ECB to decide on Ashes tour this week
articles.description: The England and Wales Cricket Board will meet this week to decide whether England will proceed with this winter's Ashes tour of Australia.
articles.content:
The England and Wales Cricket Board will meet this week to decide whether England will proceed with this winter's Ashes tour of Australia.

articles.title: What we learned from watching the 1992 World Cup final in full again | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.description: Wides, lbw calls, swing - plenty of things were different in white-ball cricket back then | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.content: Last week, we at ESPNcricinfo did something we have been thinking of doing for eight years now: pretend-live ball-by-ball commentary for a classic cricket match. We knew the result, yes, but we tried… [+6823 chars]
